title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
Welcome to my blog !
I am a R trainer and developer. Passionate about knowledge sharing and open source, I enjoy engaging with my peers and learners and contributing to a dynamic and collaborative community.
I used to have a blog a few years ago, based on Hugo (in French only).
I have decided to give a try to Quarto Websites. This new site aims at sharing my thoughts and knowledge about R, data science, epidemiology-related stuff.
Besides videos and blog posts present on this website, you can find some of my contributions to open source projects on Github :

{shinygouv} - Use the French Governmental Design System (DSFR) on you shiny apps‚Äù
{lozen} - Github and Gitlab project management tools for devs and lead dev‚Äù
{fusen} - Inflates a Rmarkdown file to magically create a package.‚Äù

I hope you will enjoy reading my posts. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions !
